description: This Python script creates and manages user memories using an Agent, with support for different models and message histories, and demonstrates usage with two example users.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Represents a message with a role and content, used for message history.

methods.name: create_user_memories
methods.description: Creates memories for a user based on provided text or message history.

methods.name: get_user_memories
methods.description: Retrieves stored memories for a specified user.
